name: Pong∞
description:
A take on the classic pong game set in an infinitely big world. Challenge your friends in a local Pong∞ battle. First player to score five goals wins.

The game offers 3 game modes:

  • Pong∞
  • Pong∞ without power ups
  • Classic Pong

Controls

Left player: W = up, S = down
Right player: Up arrow = up, Down arrow = down

Screenshots

This game was created as a part of an assignment in the course Advanced Game Design & Development at Reykjavik University, Instructor:s David Thue, Jonatan (Joon) Van Hove
